name: Chocolate Cake
description: A rich moist chocolate cake with a chocolate buttercream icing. Most, delicious and everything in between.

name: German Chocolate Cake
description: Three moist layers of chocolate cake, with a sweet and gooey carmel coconut frosting.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate
description: Out traditional rich chocolate cake layered with a whipped peanut butter frosting.

name: Toasted Almond
description: A traditional, simple crowd-pleaser topped with a rich, cooked brown sugar frosting.

name: Carrot Cake
description: A customer favorite! Dense, rich, rustic, walnut-studded and carrot-flecked. Topped with cream cheese frosting.

name: Tiramisu
description: An authentic creation of rum and espresso-soaked ladyfingers layered with mascarpone custard and whipped cream.

name: Lemon Cake
description: A refreshing four layer cake, filled with lemon curd and covered with lemon frosting.

name: Red Velvet
description: A classic Southern cake that's slathered in cream cheese frosting and sprinkled with crushed pecans.
